title: 73: SLED Divers Search River for Evidence & Courtroom Drama
description:
Law enforcement divers searched a river and area near where the murders of Maggie and Paul Murdaugh occured.
Why now? Why there?
Alex's attorney said he was at his mother's house at the time of the murders. We talk to a Sara Holstein Graves, a Hampton historian, and genealogist, about what route Alex would have taken from the murders to his mom's house. Does it make sense where they were searching would be a place Alex could have ditched a gun?
Alex's attorneys and the prosecutor get testy during a hearing.
Our legal analyst, John Snyder, breaks down what they were arguing about and if their nasty behavior was unusual
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Matt Harris and Seton Tucker
